dcterms:creator: R. Yuanzhe Pang
A. D. Lelkes
V. Q. Tran
C. Yu
dcterms:description: A dataset created for the AgreeSum task, which focuses on agreement-oriented multi-document summarization. It includes clusters of articles and their corresponding summaries, with annotations on article-summary entailment relations.
dcterms:title: AgreeSum Dataset

dcterms:creator: Gholipour Ghalandari, D.
Hokamp, C.
Pham, N. T.
Glover, J.
Ifrim, G.
dcterms:description: A large-scale multi-document summarization dataset derived from the Wikipedia Current Events Portal, containing human-written summaries linked to news articles.
dcterms:title: WCEP (Wikipedia Current Events Portal)

dcterms:creator: P. Over
Y. James
dcterms:description: A dataset from the Document Understanding Conference, which provides a benchmark for evaluating multi-document summarization systems.
dcterms:title: DUC (Document Understanding Conference)

dcterms:creator: K. Owczarzak
H. T. Dang
dcterms:description: A dataset from the Text Analysis Conference that includes various summarization tasks, providing a platform for evaluating summarization models.
dcterms:title: TAC (Text Analysis Conference)

dcterms:creator: I. Dagan
O. Glickman
B. Magnini
dcterms:description: The PASCAL Recognizing Textual Entailment challenge dataset, which is used for evaluating models on the task of recognizing entailment between text pairs.
dcterms:title: RTE (Recognizing Textual Entailment)

dcterms:creator: A. Williams
N. Nangia
S. R. Bowman
dcterms:description: A broad-coverage challenge corpus for sentence understanding through inference, designed to evaluate models on natural language inference tasks.
dcterms:title: MNLI (Multi-Genre Natural Language Inference)
